meanings.definition: A machine that automatically plays selected music when a coin is inserted.
meanings.sent1: The jukeboxes in the diner played old songs for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: People often gather around jukeboxes in bars to choose their favorite songs.
meanings.sent3: The jukeboxes at the party seemed to have a mind of their own, playing only upbeat tunes.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a jukebox, each memory a different song waiting to be played.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the jukeboxes flickered, casting a colorful glow in the dim room.

meanings.definition: To play music on a jukebox.
meanings.sent1: He jukeboxes his favorite tunes whenever he visits the local diner.
meanings.sent2: We jukebox together every Friday night, taking turns to select songs.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to jukebox with the piano keys, creating a playful melody.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter jukeboxed through the room, filling it with joy and music.
meanings.sent5: The wind jukeboxed through the trees, rustling the leaves in a natural symphony.
